text: 12.45: Hi 6.4 naŋga, 2 Pi 2.20-22Kamati uta sundɨ ñamba kuma timu, tamu arɨkinzɨpi tɨŋgɨruramata vat ñamba vanandu supɨrisupɨri haŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbuta pata indɨhuta tavɨ kandɨhañɨ kɨyɨmandɨyu. Kru kandɨhama kuha ñamba kɨyɨmi, hara tɨhu ñambatɨmaŋgarɨmandɨ. Krunavundi tɨhundu nɨŋɨnɨŋ sɨwɨmañanzihɨ yɨvurahɨmandɨ, vami.
